document.full_text: the majority of greeks see privatizations as necessary to get the country out of its debt crisis, backing government plans to sell state stakes in its industries to help pay down the national debt, a poll showed on sunday.
document.title: most greeks favor privatizations to exit crisis: poll
lines_and_colors: the majority of greeks see privatizations as necessary to get the country out of its debt crisis, backing government plans to sell state stakes in its industries to help pay down the national debt, a poll showed on sunday.
